greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Central binomial coefficients (A000984) read mod 2n, with a(0)=1.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) = binomial(2*n, n) mod 2*n, with a(0)=1.
a(n) = A053200(2*n,n) for n > 0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 01 2013
mathematica: Join[{1}, Table[Mod[Binomial[2*n, n], 2*n], {n, 1, 100}]] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 04 2018 *)
program: a053214 n = a053200 (2 * n) n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 24 2014
(PARI) concat([1], vector(100, n, lift(Mod(binomial(2*n,n), 2*n)))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 04 2018
results.author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), Dec 16 1999
ext: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Dec 18 1999
